add.title: Add a new dashboard
add.name: Name
add.tooltip: The name of the dashboard should be unique
add.error: Sorry, you cannot use this name

remove.title: Remove a dashboard
remove.name: Please enter the name of the dashboard you'd like to remove.
remove.tooltip: Enter the name of the dashboard to remove here
remove.error: This is not a valid dashboard

removewarning.title: Are you sure you want to delete this dashboard?
removewarning.description: If you remove a dashboard, it will be deleted and it will no longer be accessible. This action cannot be undone!

static.label: Text
static.tooltip: Change this component's text here. URLs ending with .png, .jpeg, .gif, .mp3, and .mp4 are supported

removewarning.title: Are you sure you want to delete this element?

savenotification.message: Successfully saved the current dashboard layout!

saveprompt.title: You still have unsaved changes, do you want to save them?
saveprompt.description: You've made changes that haven't been saved yet. If you discard changes, your unsaved changes will be deleted. You can't undo this action.

queryerror.timelimit:
The query exceeded the time limit! To prevent this, you can:
- Change the amount of retrieved rows in your personal configuration
- Request a higher time limit from the server administrator

queryinput.warning: The input does not seem a valid GraphQL query

table.addMessage: Add a row to the table by clicking here
table.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the selected rows?
table.addRowNotification: Row added! Please refresh the page to see your changes.
table.deleteRowNotification: Row deleted! Please refresh the page to see your changes.
table.cancelConfirmation: Do you want to discard your changes?
table.editError: You are not allowed to edit this column
